pr_title: CAM-12866: extract mvn methods to shared lib

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        skipStageType(failedStageTypes, env.PROFILE) && (withLabels(cambpmGetLabels(env.PROFILE)) || withDbLabels(env.DB))
          
          
            
                        skipStageType(failedStageTypes, env.PROFILE) && withLabels(cambpmGetLabels(env.PROFILE).minus('cockroachdb'))
timeline.author: yanavasileva

replies.bodyText: I adjusted the cambpmGetLabels method, so that it now accepts an optional String... argument, which we can use to remove the redundant labels.
replies.author: koevskinikola

timeline.message:
feat(ci): extract maven methods to shared lib

* Move Maven-related methods to the CamBPM shared library;
* Refactor method names to containe the shared lib prefix.

Related to CAM-12713, CAM-12866
DROP ME: add shared lib branch ref
